name: thinkcode-ai-platform
description: ThinkCode AI Platform - Enterprise-grade intelligent development platform powered by AI
author: Integr8

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:admin && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:dashboard" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:deps
scripts.test: npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:admin
scripts.lint: npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:admin
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
